title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a frontend developer with React experience. You will work closely with our UI/UX designers and backend developers to create seamless and performant web applications. Responsibilities include building reusable components, optimizing applications for speed and scalability, and collaborating in an agile environment. Strong communication and problem-solving skills are a must.

title: React Engineer
description: Join our React team to build modern web apps. You will be responsible for developing new user-facing features, ensuring the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs, and optimizing components for maximum performance. Experience with Redux and modern JavaScript is required. You will also participate in code reviews and contribute to our growing codebase.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Creative UI/UX designer needed for mobile and web projects. You will create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs, and work closely with developers to ensure a seamless user experience. Strong portfolio and proficiency in Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD are required. Attention to detail and a passion for user-centered design are essential.

title: Backend Developer
description: Work on scalable backend systems using Node.js. Responsibilities include designing RESTful APIs, integrating with databases, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the frontend. Experience with Express and MongoDB is a plus. You will also be involved in code reviews and system architecture discussions.

title: Fullstack Developer
description: Fullstack developer with experience in MERN stack. You will work on both frontend and backend, building robust and scalable web applications. Responsibilities include developing APIs, integrating third-party services, and ensuring cross-platform optimization. Strong problem-solving skills and experience with cloud services are desirable.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze data and generate business insights. You will work with large datasets, create dashboards, and provide actionable recommendations to stakeholders. Proficiency in SQL, Python, and Excel is required. Experience with data visualization tools and statistical analysis is a plus.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure. You will automate deployment processes, monitor system performance, and ensure high availability of services. Experience with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes is required. Strong scripting and troubleshooting skills are essential.

title: QA Engineer
description: Manual and automation testing for web applications. You will design and execute test cases, identify bugs, and work closely with developers to ensure product quality. Experience with Selenium, Jest, and Cypress is required. Familiarity with agile methodologies is a plus.

title: Mobile Developer
description: Develop cross-platform mobile apps. You will work with Flutter and React Native to deliver high-quality mobile applications. Responsibilities include collaborating with designers, integrating APIs, and optimizing app performance. Experience with Dart and mobile app deployment is required.

title: Software Tester
description: Test software products and report bugs. You will be responsible for creating test plans, executing manual and automated tests, and documenting results. Experience with bug tracking tools and automation frameworks is preferred. Strong attention to detail and analytical skills are required.

title: Project Manager
description: Lead software projects and manage teams. You will coordinate project activities, manage timelines and budgets, and ensure successful delivery of software solutions. Experience with Agile and Scrum methodologies is required. Strong leadership and communication skills are essential.

title: Business Analyst
description: Bridge business requirements and technical teams. You will gather and analyze business needs, document requirements, and work with developers to deliver solutions. Strong analytical, documentation, and communication skills are required. Experience in software projects is a plus.

title: Systems Engineer
description: Maintain and optimize IT systems. You will be responsible for system administration, troubleshooting, and ensuring system security and reliability. Experience with Linux, networking, and scripting is required. Ability to work independently and as part of a team is important.

title: Network Administrator
description: Administer and secure company networks. You will configure and maintain network devices, monitor network performance, and implement security measures. Experience with firewalls, VPNs, and network troubleshooting is required. Certifications in networking are a plus.

title: Content Writer
description: Write engaging content for blogs and websites. You will research topics, write original articles, and edit content for clarity and SEO. Experience with content management systems and SEO best practices is required. Strong writing and editing skills are essential.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Design graphics for digital and print media. You will create visual concepts, work with marketing teams, and deliver high-quality designs for various platforms. Proficiency in Photoshop and Illustrator is required. Creativity and attention to detail are key.

title: Research Engineer
description: Conduct research and develop innovative solutions. You will work on cutting-edge projects, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and publish findings. Experience with Python and machine learning is required. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills are essential.

title: AI/ML Engineer
description: Develop and deploy AI/ML models. You will design, train, and evaluate machine learning models, and work with large datasets. Experience with Python, TensorFlow, and deep learning frameworks is required. Strong mathematical and programming skills are a must.

title: Security Analyst
description: Monitor and analyze security threats. You will investigate incidents, implement security measures, and provide recommendations to improve security posture. Experience with SIEM tools and incident response is required. Certifications in security are a plus.

title: Technical Writer
description: Create technical documentation and manuals. You will work with engineers to gather information, write clear documentation, and maintain manuals for software products. Experience with technical writing and documentation tools is required. Excellent communication skills are essential.

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design and oversee cloud infrastructure for enterprise clients. You will architect scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud solutions using AWS, Azure, or GCP. Responsibilities include migration planning, automation, and mentoring junior engineers. Strong experience with cloud security and DevOps practices is required.

title: Product Owner
description: Own the product roadmap and prioritize features for development teams. You will gather requirements, define user stories, and ensure alignment with business goals. Experience in Agile/Scrum environments and excellent communication skills are essential.

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Assist in building and training machine learning models. You will work with large datasets, preprocess data, and experiment with algorithms under the guidance of senior engineers. Python and basic ML knowledge required. Internship certificate provided.

title: WordPress Developer
description: Develop and maintain WordPress websites for clients. You will customize themes, create plugins, and ensure responsive design. Experience with PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required. Knowledge of SEO best practices is a plus.

title: Salesforce Administrator
description: Manage and optimize Salesforce CRM for business operations. You will handle user management, workflows, reports, and integrations. Salesforce certification and experience with automation tools are required.
